content: **from the description ** two creamy shades of white and different stitch patterns creat eye-catching contrast in this simple yet chic coat it s dressy enough for special occasions but great for everyday wear **skill level ** intermediate **finished garment measurements ** - bust 39 43 47 51 55 - length 39 5 39 5 40 40 40 5 **materials ** - moda dea washable wool worsted weight 166yds 9 10 11 12 13 balls - moda dea metro bulky chunky weight 124yds 5 5 6 6 7 balls **gauge ** - size i/9 5mm hook and cross stitch pattern 16 sts = 4 25 10 pattern row = 4 - size l/11 8mm hook and single_crochet pattern 9sts = 4 11 single_crochet pattern row = 4
